CatDescriptText: Joe Ross, student, Mt. Lebanon, was part of the Pittsburghers Speak Up column, published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 10, 1962, pg. 11 with question: "Do you think a shorter work week is the answer to the job loss posed by automation?" Answer reads: " No I don't think it's good. I think that the people who are now in jobs would be hurt that much more..."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Joe Ross wearing leather coat with dark plush collar, and eyeglasses, posed in front of building, Downtown
